casebody.data:
STORMONT-VAIL HEALTHCARE, INC. and Stormont-Vail, Inc., Appellants,
v.
The BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS FOR JACKSON COUNTY, Kansas, Appellee,
v.
Corey Mellenbruch, Third-party Defendant. No. 117,650 Court of Appeals of Kansas. Opinion filed May 11, 2018.

Judgment is reversed. Case is remanded.
